General.Name: Caihong Display Devices Co Ltd
General.Description: Caihong Display Devices Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of substrate glass and display panels in China. It offers TFT-LCD liquid crystal substrate glasses, liquid crystal glass panels, and other glass products and related products, as well as modules and supporting products, and new display devices and components, etc. It also engages in the production, processing, and operation of electronic glass products; real estate development, property management, landscape design, venue, and house leasing; and sale of non-metallic minerals and products, as well as provision of child care and education services. Caihong Display Devices Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Xianyang, China.
